subject: Shaping Edinburgh’s Future: Plant-Based Catering for Our Council

bodyConfig.opening_paragraph: I think we need to be deeply committed to addressing the climate emergency.
later_paragraphs: To lead by example and reduce the council’s carbon footprint, I respectfully request that Edinburgh Council itself adopt plant-based menus for all council-run events and facilities.
Research shows plant-based meals can lower greenhouse gas emissions by up to 75%, while also improving public health and supporting local sustainable producers.
Several UK councils have successfully piloted plant-based catering in council chambers and civic functions.
A council-wide commitment would send a powerful signal that Edinburgh also stands at the forefront of climate action.
bodyConfig.closing: Thank you in advance for your leadership in building a greener Edinburgh.
